reviews.text: We only ate at la barretina! we recommend the proposed menu: excellent, plentiful and at a low price. They are very friendly and they welcome children very well. recommended!
reviews.title: we just ate there

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel is fantastic! For a very cheap price (I paid 45€ per night) you get an excellent room, conveniently located and provided by a very friendly host :-)
reviews.title: The best ratio quality/price

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We would reccommend this Hostel because the facilities are more like a 4* hotel. The linen is changed every day and the rooms are modern and spotless. It is run by a lovely family. The restaurant is beautiful and the home cooked 3 course del dia is only €10 inclding wine. Best hostel we have ever been in.
reviews.title: Family run 5* Hostel
